column4: has anyone else noticed that though ubuntu 9.10 is the late, great ver., it has a LOT of bugs that 9.04 didn't?  Or is it just me?
A new version is usually going to have bugs that the prior release didnt

do you think the ubuntu team is actively working to fix a lot of these?  I know it's free and all so it's kinda unkosher to be asking people to do more free work, but I was just wondering if they're working on them.  Do you know?
I do know and there are sometimes reasons why bugs wernt fixed as the fix would cause a regression on the whole
